channel.title: Help adding Character Editor (::char)
channel.description: I am finally deciding to come back to RSPS's, which I quit about 3 years ago xD So i don't even know where to begin to make a ::char command to pop up the character change interface. Please help in detail :) I'm using and old ass source, project 16 :p It's a 317 btw.

item.title: Help adding Character Editor (::char)
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

I missed a bracket, my bad. Glad you got it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help adding Character Editor (::char)
item.dc:creator: @Swaggin_Dragon Swaggin Dragon
item.description:
@Swaggin_Dragon wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:2, topic:413881”]Oh ya, p16 ftw. Now THAT’s old school.

erm… not sure of the methods in p16 but it’d go something like this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("char") {
        showInterface(3559);
}

Just search for existing interface declarations and modify accordingly.[/quote]

Yep got it all settled. Final code turned out to be:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("char")) { showInterface(3559); }

I’m slowly starting to remember all this stuff haha.

Read full topic

item.title: Help adding Character Editor (::char)
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“Get Blitz, post:3, topic:413881”]should be simple
something like

ifPlayerCommandstartswith(Char) {
GetPA.ShowInterface(INTERFACEID)
Canupdateappearnce = true
}

I just put this together on my ipod so its not 100%

try looking at the make over mage actionHandler[/quote]

Ouch, remind me to never post on a touch screen hand-held device whilst trying to help someone understand snippets of code. XD

Read full topic

        showInterface(3559);
}

Just search for existing interface declarations and modify accordingly.[/quote]
Hell yea haha I’m an oldschool RSPS guy I hate the new stuff, I just can’t get into it. Everything was best when all the czar based ps’s were ruling haha. And I’m gonna try this now and see what I get

Read full topic
